known_issues: Automated build/update attempt to remove TEST_RECOVERY logic failed (implementation did not go through)

existing_features.title: Remove the frontend 'Test Mode' indicator and associated query/hook usage that checks test recovery mode status.

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove TEST_RECOVERY / TEST_RECOVERY_MODE logic completely from the Motoko backend
Remove the TEST_RECOVERY_MODE flag and all TEST_RECOVERY/test-recovery logic from the Motoko backend, so workout generation always uses the normal recovery-based selection logic.
Remove any backend API surface used to expose test recovery mode status (e.g., an isTestRecoveryModeEnabled query) and update the generated frontend/backend bindings accordingly.

projectName: Remove TEST_RECOVERY_MODE from backend and delete related frontend test-mode UI
